mapper.insert: insert into netease_callback_request (sms_history_id, mobile, sendid, result, send_time, report_time, spliced, callback_time, created_time) values (#{smsHistoryId}, #{mobile}, #{sendid}, #{result}, #{sendTime}, #{reportTime}, #{spliced}, #{callbackTime}, #{createdTime})
mapper.update: update netease_callback_request set result = #{result}, send_time = #{sendTime}, report_time = #{reportTime}, spliced = #{spliced}, callback_time = #{callbackTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from netease_callback_request where mobile = #{mobile} and sendid = ${sendid}

select * from netease_callback_request where 60 > TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, created_time, #{now}) and exists (select 1 from sms_history where sms_history.id = netease_callback_request.sms_history_id and sms_history.backup_id is null) and ((result is null and #{now} > DATE_ADD(created_time, INTERVAL 30 SECOND)) or (result is not null and result != 'DELIVRD'))
